00026 #ifndef DM_SERVER_H_
00027 #define DM_SERVER_H_
00028 #include <Ice/Ice.h>
00029 #include "DistributedMap.h"
00030 #include "Hashmap_Array.h"
00031 #include <IceUtil/Mutex.h>
00032 #include <IceUtil/Handle.h>
00033 #include <list>
00034 #include "Server_Helper.h"

00036 using namespace GlobalTable;
00037 using namespace std;
00038 
00039 const int QUE_FULL = 50;
00040 const int NUM_CONSUMERS = 3;
00041 const int CHUNK = 10;
00042 
00043 /**
00044  * Container class for a put and get job.
00045  * The putNget_async operation is an asynchronous operation
00046  * with asynchronous method dispatch.
00047  *
00048  * Hence a call should be queued up for later processing
00049  * and this class stores all the details pertinent to that call.
00050  */
00051 class PNGJob: public IceUtil::Shared {
00052 public:
00053     //!The call back object
00054     AMD_DistributedMap_putNgetPtr png_cb;
00055 
00056     //!The word on which this operation
00057     //!is called
00058     string word;
00059 
00060     //!The serialized form of data that
00061     //!needs to be accumulated into the
00062     //!entry pointed by word
00063     string delta;
00064 
00065     PNGJob(const AMD_DistributedMap_putNgetPtr& cb, const string& word,
00066             const string& delta) :
00067         png_cb(cb), word(word), delta(delta) {
00068     }
00069 };
00070 typedef IceUtil::Handle<PNGJob> PNGJobPtr;
00071 
00072 
00073 //!The Server class that implements the DistributedMap Ice interface
00074 /**
00075  *
00076  * It essentially holds a part of the distributed
00077  * map. Associates a 'key' to a particular 'value'
00078  *
00079  * The implementation abstracts out the semantics.
00080  * The only accepted key & value types are strings
00081  * Other types of objects have to be serialized
00082  * before they can be stored.
00083  *
00084  * It provides the usual get, set & remove operations
00085  * with the usual semantics.
00086  *
00087  * It also provides accumulator semantics with the
00088  * put operation. Values stored using a put operation
00089  * are accumulated instead of being replaced. Note
00090  * that the semantics of this accumulating is provided
00091  * by a helper class that implements the Server_Helper
00092  * interface
00093  *
00094  * There is also a putNget operation which uses AMD to
00095  * not block dispatch threads. The putNget is also an
00096  * AMI. More info on AMI in client class. Please look up
00097  * Ice documentation for more details. This operation puts
00098  * a value for the given key and returns the result of the
00099  * accumulate operation.
00100  *
00101  * It also provides a barrier implementation that lets
00102  * clients synchronize. This is a very simple use of AMD
00103  * The dispatch threads are released without busy waiting.
00104  * Only a counter is incremented with every call. Once the
00105  * counter reaches num_clients registered, a response is
00106  * sent to all queued up call back objects.
00107  */
00108 class DM_Server: public DistributedMap {
00109 public:
00110     //!The num of clients that will be accessing the DistributedMap
00111     //!This parameter is used to provide a barrier
00112     DM_Server(int num_clients, Server_Helper&);
00113     virtual ~DM_Server();
00114 
00115     //!The put operation.
00116     //!Note the slight difference in semantics
00117     //!This has accumulator semantics. The value is accumulated
00118     //!and not replaced
00119     void put(const string& key, const string& val, const Ice::Current&);
00120 
00121     //!The set operation.
00122     //!The value is replaced if the key already exists
00123     void set(const string& key, const string& val, const Ice::Current&);
00124 
00125     //!The get operation.
00126     //!Sets val with the value of the key and returns true
00127     //!if the key exists. Else does not set val and returns false
00128     bool get(const string& key, string& val, const Ice::Current&);
00129 
00130     //!The remove operation.
00131     //!Removes the key-value pair from the table
00132     //!If the key does not exist, returns false. Else returns true
00133     bool remove(const string&, string&, const Ice::Current&);
00134 
00135     //!The put and get operation.
00136     //!Does a put(word,delta) and returns the updated value
00137     //!png_cb is the AMD call back object
00138     void putNget_async(const AMD_DistributedMap_putNgetPtr& png_cb,
00139             const string& word, const string& delta, const Ice::Current&);
00140 
00141     //!Barrier. Helps clients synchronize
00142     void
00143             waitForAllClients_async(
00144                     const AMD_DistributedMap_waitForAllClientsPtr&,
00145                     const Ice::Current&);
00146 
00147 private:
00148     int _num_clients, _clients_done;
00149     int _num_consumers, _waiting_thrds;
00150     typedef vector<AMD_DistributedMap_waitForAllClientsPtr> cb_vector_t;
00151     cb_vector_t _cbs;
00152     list<PNGJobPtr> _png_jobs;
00153     IceUtil::Mutex _cb_mutex, _png_jobs_mutex;
00154     IceUtil::Monitor<IceUtil::Mutex> _monitor_mutex;
00155 
00156     //!The data structure to store the key-value mapping
00157     //!Its an array of hashmaps.
00158     typedef Hashmap_Array<string, string> hashmap_array;
00159     hashmap_array _tc_table;
00160 
00161     Server_Helper& _server_helper;
00162 
00163     bool get_counts(const string&, string&);
00164     void upd_counts(const string& word, const string& delta);
00165 };
00166 
00167 #endif /* DM_SERVER_H_ */
